snippet: Sinh Vinh Ngo Nguyen pleaded not guilty Friday to charges of attempting to provide material support to Al Qaeda and lying on a passport application to facilitate an act of terrorism.
abstract: California man, Sinh Vinh Ngo Nguyen, pleads not guilty to charges of attempting to provide material support to Al Qaeda and lying on a passport application to facilitate an act of terrorism.
lead_paragraph: Sinh Vinh Ngo Nguyen pleaded not guilty Friday to charges of attempting to provide material support to Al Qaeda and lying on a passport application to facilitate an act of terrorism.

headline.main: California: Man Accused of Aiding Al Qaeda
headline.print_headline: California: Man Accused of Aiding Al Qaeda
